SELECT FST_RGST_DTM , FNL_MDFC_DTM , CLINR_RGNO , RCP_YM , CLINR_NM , BLD_CD , (SELECT BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS WHERE BLD_CD = T1.BLD_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) AS BLD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APLC_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS APLC_DT , APLCNS_NM , APLC_PRTNR_NO , CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID CNTRW_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID) AS CNTRW_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID CNTR_LRORE_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID) AS CNTR_LRORE_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , IDF_APN_FILE_ID IDF_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = IDF_APN_FILE_ID) AS IDF_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , BNKB_APN_FILE_ID BNKB_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = BNKB_APN_FILE_ID) AS BNKB_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , FMN_CO_SPPT_AMT , CLINR_FXN_AMT , TAX_DDCTAM , CLINR_FXN_AMT - TAX_DDCTAM AS AMT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WRK_STRTDT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRK_STRTDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WRK_ENDDT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRK_ENDDT , (CASE WHEN WRK_ENDDT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) WORK_STATUS , BRYY_MMDD , RRNO_ENCR , LOCARA_TNO , EXNO_ENCR , IDV_TNO , '' AS TEL_NUM , ZIP ||' '|| BAS_ADR AS ADDRESS , BNK_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(BNK_CD,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_NM , ACNO_ENCR FROM TB_CBCL_CLINR_BAS T1 /*청소원기본*/ WHERE 1=1
AND BLD_CD IN ( SELECT A.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_OG_BAS A /*조직기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS B /*빌딩기본*/ ON A.BLD_CD = B.BLD_CD WHERE A.OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd} AND B.BLD_NM LIKE #{bldNm}||'%' )
AND BLD_CD IN (SELECT T2.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_SPPT_OG_IZ T1 /* 영업지원조직*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 ON T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND T2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN SUBSTR(T1.MNGT_STRT_DT,1,6) AND SUBSTR(T1.MNGT_END_DT,1,6) AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} )
AND CLINR_NM LIKE '%'|| #{clinrNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY FST_RGST_DTM DESC

SELECT FST_RGST_DTM , FNL_MDFC_DTM , CLINR_RGNO , RCP_YM , CLINR_NM , BLD_CD , (SELECT BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS WHERE BLD_CD = T1.BLD_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) AS BLD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APLC_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS APLC_DT , APLCNS_NM , APLC_PRTNR_NO , CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID CNTRW_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID) AS CNTRW_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID CNTR_LRORE_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID) AS CNTR_LRORE_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , IDF_APN_FILE_ID IDF_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = IDF_APN_FILE_ID) AS IDF_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , BNKB_APN_FILE_ID BNKB_ATTH_DOC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND ATTH_DOC_ID = BNKB_APN_FILE_ID) AS BNKB_ATTH_DOC_ID_NUMBER_OF_FILES , FMN_CO_SPPT_AMT , CLINR_FXN_AMT , TAX_DDCTAM , (CLINR_FXN_AMT - TAX_DDCTAM) AS AMT , WRK_STRTDT , WRK_ENDDT , (CASE WHEN WRK_ENDDT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS WORK_STATUS , BRYY_MMDD , RRNO_ENCR , LOCARA_TNO , EXNO_ENCR , IDV_TNO , '' AS TEL_NUM , ZIP ||' '|| BAS_ADR AS ADDRESS , BNK_CD , ZIP , BAS_ADR , DTL_ADR , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(BNK_CD,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_NM , ACNO_ENCR FROM TB_CBCL_CLINR_BAS T1 /*청소원기본*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND BLD_CD IN ( SELECT A.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_OG_BAS A /*조직기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS B /*빌딩기본*/ ON A.BLD_CD = B.BLD_CD WHERE A.OG_TP_CD IN ('W01', 'W02') /*WELLS M조직, P조직*/ AND B.BLD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{bldNm} ||'%' )
AND CLINR_NM LIKE '%'|| #{clinrNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY FST_RGST_DTM DESC
